title: Who is your....
body:
Favourite juker?
(The person u juke people most with)
Mine is:
Zed
Shaco

replies.body: I have outjuked many times with taric, you dont need a fucking escape or cc to juke people!!
Taric does some pretty fantastic jukes.. Deez gems

> [{quoted}](name=Thinker,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=yA22O26O,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-07-17T09:09:01.108+0000)
>
> I have outjuked many times with taric, you dont need a fucking escape or cc to juke people!!

exactly

having a dash just makes it look cooler
Taric has the best dunk, his ult smashes a hammer into the ground, nothing can possibly be better than that!!
i LOVE juking with shaco! my favourite trick is to pretend to run away but q into a bush behind them and then ult and make the clone run away while i back
{{champion:7}}  is the most fun to juke with and i've done it soooo many times
{{champion:91}} nuff said a 6 second e at 40% cdr and max lvl and a 30 second ult I am the juke master with him lived on 100 hp or less so many times after getting a kill
